Это абсолют хорошей игры, тут смешано все лучшее в игропроме, начиная хорошим юмором, заканчивая геймплейной составляющей. Есть игры, вроде Far Cry 5, где вроде все в порядке, звук в порядке, оружие чувствуется хорошо, геймплей бодрый, но в сумме остается послевкусие что чего-то не хватает. Здесь же части игры не просто созданы хорошо, но и вместе смотрятся хорошо, не оставляя игрока сидеть с не понимающим видом, и пытаться понять, что же с игрой не так. Финальное мнение таково: отдельные разработчики ответственные за разработку игры не просто хорошо выполнили работу, но и совместили результат в одну игру так чтобы она выглядела, звучала и игралась хорошо.

[i]Where do I even begin...?[/i] Portal 2 being a successor to the revolutionary game Portal took it a step further in the gaming industry. Portal 2 is by far the most [u]innovative game[/u] in the gaming industry. Portal 2 is an extremely fun game with a phenomenal story, good characters, a sense of humor, excellent sound design, and advanced puzzle mechanics along with some of the best level design from the Valve team. 

Portal 2's game play is some of the most fun I have ever had in a game. Its complex and fun, not to easy, not to hard. A perfect balance to put it in better words. The portal gun mechanic is an original concept from Valves original portal and they have perfected it. The game gets progressively more challenging as you progress through the rich story of the game making sure to always keep you on your feet. As I stated in the introduction Valve has perfected their level design.

Portal 2 is [b]NOT[/b] the type of game that dies out in a few years after its release like many other games. This game beats out the Call of Duty franchise by fucking miles. Portal 2 was released nearly 10 years ago as of this review and the physics and graphics of this game still hold up to this day unlike Call of Duty. Valve have created some of the most innovative games on the market today and they are certainly here to stay. 

What can I say? Valve knows how to make good fucking games. The reviews and the active player base just proves how a great game ages over time [b]UNLIKE[/b] the Call of Duty franchise and many other over hyped games that die shortly after they release. The game is still being played for the first time every day and the numbers [b]ARE NOT[/b] going down.

You may say Portal 2 is not a perfect game. You know what I say? [b]FUCK YOU[/b]. That's what I fucking say. You may say "oH pORtAlS tOo oLd." Shut the fuck up Portal 2s gameplay holds up perfectly to this day and out preforms many current releases. You may say "iTs tO hArd." I disagree with your shit opinion, Portal has a perfect balance of difficulty and gets harder as you improve at the game. you may say "CoD iS bEtter." I don't think even need to fucking explain. You may say "iT mAkes mE moTion sICk." Just shut the fuck up no it doesn't.

You may be asking is this game worth the price? Fuck yes it is. This game at its base price goes for a generous $9.99 but more often than not this game is on sale for a mere 1 dollar and 99 cents. Compare this price to the shit price Activison is selling the [url=https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/6465/Call_of_Duty_Franchise_Collection/COD] COD Collection [/url]for.  

Portal 2 was a game released completely ahead of its time and it continues to beat out games released today. Great job to Valve on making this revolutionary title and hope to see a Portal 3. 

-Your regards catfood

Отличная головоломка с не менее отличным сюжетом 
Плюсы:
+Механика портальной пушки,она просто великолепна
+Музыка
+Юмор персонажей в частности Гладос и Уитли,чего только стоит "Тот самый момент,когда он нас убивает"
+Масштабы лаборатории 
+разные секреты спрятанные на уровнях(изрисованные стены персонажем Даг Ратман)
+Звуковые сообщения Кейва Джонсона 
+финальная битва 
Минусы:
-Переходы между уровнями,ненавижу этот чёртов лифт 
-Опять же нету 3-ей части 
12/10
